descript.abstract: The Component Crop Yield table lists commonly grown crops and their expected range in yields when grown on the referenced map unit component. Yields for the map unit as a whole are given in the Mapunit Crop Yield table.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attr.attrdef: The expected yield per acre of the specific crop without supplemental irrigation.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop without supplemental irrigation.
Crop yield units per unit area for the specified crop.
The common name for the crop.
A non-connotative string of characters used to uniquely identify a record in the Component Crop Yield table.
Crop specific groupings of soils indicating potential yields under a high level of management.
The unique identifier of a record in the Component table. Use this column to join the Component Crop Yield table to the Component table.
An index of the capacity of a soil to produce a specific plant under a defined management system.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop with irrigation.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop with irrigation.
The expected yield per acre of the specific crop without supplemental irrigation.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The expected yield per acre of the specific crop with irrigation.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
